Posts.Content: Hi Sarg! So great to hear you're doing well. I'm going to get surgery soon too, so don't mind me if I ask you some questions after. Keep in touch!
Posts.Title: Three Weeks After Surgery

Posts.Content: Hey zrisk002, that sounds really scary. I wish I had some advice to give you, but the real best answer is to see a doctor. If you're short on time/healthcare funds, you can always ask a question (like this one: Link removed as per policy )that website. It'ls reassuring to hear answers from doctors right away sometimes.
Posts.Title: 27 w/ prostate issues, just ejaculated blood. Any explanation?
